title: adidas Metro Soccer Socks (1 pair) long over the calf team sports socks
description: READY FOR ACTION: These premium socks stay in place and give you excellent feel for the ball. Lightweight but durable and made with moisture wicking yarns to transfer sweat away from you feet reducing blisters and heat. Whether it's practice or game day, feel good, play great.
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABILITY: Construction from lightweight yarns that provide elevated durability for everyday wear as well as a close fit.
DOUBLE WELT CONSTRUCTION: An improved double-welt construction keeps these socks in the right place all game long for limited distraction and adjustment.
EXTRA SUPPORT: Arch and ankle compression keeps your foot secure while provided much-needed support.
NCAA COMPLIANT: These socks meet NCAA on field standards, so you can wear them on game day at the college level.
